channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ChatGPT Can Tell You What Scientists Are Doing With LLMs
item.description: Confused about LLM architectures? Ask a model. They’ll tell you.

item.title: Apple iPad Air M2 Latest Model Just Hit All-Time Low Prices—Up To $150 Off
item.description: The latest iPad Air models are heavily reduced at Amazon with price reductions across the range.

item.title: Stellar Blade’s Big ‘Nier: Automata’ Crossover Has A Release Date, Plus Photo Mode Arrives
item.description: We now know when Stellar Blade's big Nier: Automata crossover is coming, plus the launch of photo mode.

item.title: The problem with the movie version
